name: Pixel Jump - Endless Gun Jumper Game
name_original: Pixel Jump - Endless Gun Jumper Game
description:
Jump and gun down enemies...in RETRO PIXEL STYLE! Defeat monsters and collect the loot to unlock other awesome characters with special abilities! Land on mega jump boosts and reach even higher scores!

NOTICE: This is an INSANELY ADDICTIVE endless platform game packed with loads of fun and pixel art eye-candy!
